item.description:
PLEASE RSVP ON THE CENTRAL CT SINGLES MEETUP PAGE

Central CT Singles would like to invite you to:

Central CT Singles Invites You To: The Ultimate Pool Party At Ultimate Billiards
Ultimate Billiards -151 Webster Square Road in Berlin, CT -across from Berlin Showcase Cinemas

Saturday, December 8, 2007 at 8pm

Don't pay a cover charge at the door -tell them you are with Central CT Singles. Your ticket price includes the cover charge, unlimited pool, air hockey, ping-pong, darts, drink specials, pool lessons, prizes, and introductions to everyone in Central CT Singles!

Join Local Singles for a fun night at Ultimate Billiards with FREE Pool, Drink Specials, and LIVE Music with Avenue Groove

We will have FREE Pool Lessons and prizes all night long!

Glow in the Dark Pool Tables

Drink Specials

Live Music from Avenue Groove

FREE POOL All Night

FREE Pool Lessons For Beginners

FREE Air Hockey

FREE Ping Pong

FREE Basketball Games


Have Fun And Meet Local Singles

All age groups are welcome!


Tickets are $15 online or at the event

Pay with Credit Card using the PayPal Button

Other Groups That Have Been Invited:

Central CT Singles
CTNites.com VIP Entertainment Club
South Windsor Newly Single
Hartford Newly Single
IMS Singles



Visit www.CentralCTSingles.com for more info, or call (860) 236-3343

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: Central CT Singles Invites You To: Sat Dec 8 Pool Party At Ultimate Billiards
